name: AeraForHome
0:
”Alexa, tell Aera to turn on.”
”Alexa, ask Aera what the scent level is.”
”Alexa, tell Aera to adjust the scent level.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aera
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Smart home scenting just got smarter and even more convenient. Now, Aera works with Amazon Alexa giving you voice control to turn your Aera on and off, remind you of your scent level and adjust the strength of scent in a room.

To turn your Aera on: 
“Alexa, tell Aera to turn on” 
 
To find out the current scent level:
“Alexa, ask Aera what the scent level is”
 
To change the scent level: 
Alexa, tell Aera to adjust the scent level to six.
*scent levels range from one to ten, with ten as the highest. 
 
To turn your Aera off: 
“Alexa, tell Aera to turn off” 
 
To find out more about Aera smart home fragrance, check out aeraforhome.com.

To use this skill you will need an Aera and an Aera Account, which you can setup in the AeraForHome mobile application.
